Vehicle.Name: ETA-2 Actis-Class Light Interceptor
Vehicle.Description:
[H3]ETA-2 [I]Actis[i] -Class Light Interceptor[h3] Kuat Systems Engineering's Eta-2 [I]Actis[i] is a small, fast, lightweight fighter descended from KSE's elderly [I]Delta[i]-series fighters. Part of the Republic Navy's late-war modernization program - along with the ARC-170 and the Alpha-3 [I]Nimbus[i] - the [I]Actis[i] was envisioned by its designers as a multi-role, medium-range fighter.
[P]Known colloquially as the Jedi starfighter due to its extensive use by the Jedi Order, the [I]Actis[i] is a fighter with an extremely minimalist design. A small, egg-shaped, single-position cockpit sits far aft between two long, variable-geometry, cranked-delta wings with extendable S-foils. Beneath the cockpit is a sub-fuselage that contains the fighter's powerful ion engines as well many of the ship's major systems. Like its [I]Delta[i]-series antecedents, the [I]Actis[i] is too small for a hyperdrive and therefore relies on carriers or hyperspace docking rings for long-range work. The ship does possess a full astromech socket, however; embarked droids can access the ship's maintenance systems and act as a navicomputer for hyperspace ring jumps.
[P]Despite its designation as a light fighter, the [I]Actis[i] almost comically overgunned. The fighter's primary armament consists of a pair of medium laser cannons that run the length of the wings' inner surfaces. These fire-linked cannons allow the [I]Actis[i] to punch well above its weight and give the fighter a longer reach than other ships of its class. In addition. the [I]Actis[i] mounts a pair of light ion cannons on the wings' leading edges. These weapons combined make the [I]Actis[i] a terror to other fightercraft and allow it to tangle with light gunboats and armed shuttlecraft as well.
